title: Drawing, "Design for Boxes with Double Doors Unit", March 18, 1933
inscribed: Lower right: D#3688./Boxes with Double Doors/.unit./Jules Bouy monogram and trademark/N.Y. March 18th 1933/.SCALE: 1" - 1'.0"
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description:
Design for unit consisting of 7 double door horizontal boxes on base, ascending in size from top.*  Sketch under drawing shows elevation of the swing of doors. 
* Doors are numbered at right of each box: 1-7.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Boxes with Double Doors Unit", March 18, 1933.
March 18, 1933. Color pencil on tracing paper. Museum purchase through gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 2003-15-8.
